Text: Tsk!

I see you've aimed for the arteries leading to my
heart...but you've missed!
Aghh... Its attacks are super strong...!
Zeta!
Do better, cat!
You dumb dog! You can't attack it head-on—
Graaaarrrr!!!
Brute force stands no chance against a dragon!
It blocked it?!

Hey Beta! Haven't you done some research on this
bastard's weak points?!

Don't look at me! I didn't expect there to be an
actual dragon in the woods!

Then what about dragons in general?! They're living
creatures, so they can be killed, right?

They don't...have weak points... None whatsoever as
far as I know!
Whaaat?!

In fact, it's said that slaying a dragon is
impossible using standard attacks—
What?! But that's cheating!

That thing's on another level. Sounds like humans
don't stand a chance.

Definitely not your run-of-the-mill monster. Not that
I'd expect anything less from a dragon.

Now then...guess it's a matter of when to show up to
the party.

Welcome to the real world, little elf, where here be
dragons!
Eeeek!!!
Epsilon!
D-Dodged it...just barely!

Not sure what you're defending, but it seems you're
struggling to dodge my attacks.
No one asked you! Your turn, Beta!
Got it!

That was a definite hit, but it had zero effect...
What should I do?!
Aaah!!!
Beta!
Take this!!!
Gamma!
Beta! Epsilon! Stand back!

Don't have to worry about missing when the target's
this big, but...

Hitting your target is not the same as defeating it.
Indeed, the wiser are quicker to despair!
Heh. We'll see about that...
Hmph?!
...With this single blow!
It worked!

A deep blow to the spine! That would take out any
living creature—
Cleverly done, noble one!
Huh?!
Agh...
Lady Alpha!
...What strength!
(Well then, time to get started!)
Indeed, I am strong.

And so are all of you—so strong, in fact, no ordinary
being would stand a chance against you.

However, in this world, there is always someone
higher up in the food chain...
Indeed.
Huh?!
That voice...!

The same can be said of a pathetic dragon who carves
its idle history in the shadows of this sleeping forest.
Who's there?!

My name is Shadow. I lurk in the darkness and hunt
down shadows.

You wretched creature, playing games to relieve the
boredom of your perpetual existence. I shall cut you
down with my blade.
Shadow! You came all this way to save us?!

(Heh... Nailed it! Did my intro and called out the
dragon. Total isekai move!)

...I got it! All of you, block the dragon's retreat!
Take care to avoid the fog! We'll encircle the
beast and gradually close in!

(Hmm. Pretty sure I also nailed that pose, but Alpha's
ad-libs are always the chef's kiss!)
Shadow! Your orders for the Seven Shadows!

Alpha—all of you, stand back. This is my battle to
fight.
Master Shadow... Understood!

Ahhh! Master Shadow! How divine! I must write down
every detail of his majestic visage!

Beta...how're you taking notes during an emergency
like this?

Not that I'm any less excited Master Shadow is here!
I'm so happy I could sing!
C'mon, boss man! Kill it!

Will he perform another miracle...against our most
formidable foe yet?
